page.title: 11The People Of Congleton
page.content: {Congleton}is generally made up of "migrants" as we found when we conducted a survey aimed at finding if {Congleton}is actually made up primarily of "Congletonions". {44%}of the children surveyed were born in Congleton and its surrounding area. {52%}came from other parts of the United Kingdom. The remaining{4%}were from abroad. {2%}were from Switzerland and{2%}were from New Zealand. When people were asked why they moved to{Congleton}there was a mixed response. The main reasons were employment, family and environment.
